summary: After a plane crash, two opposing half-brothers find themselves on an amazing lost island where enlightened pacifist humans and intelligent talking dinosaurs have created a utopian medieval society. But imminent disaster approaches.
cast: David Thewlis|Katie Carr|Jim Carter|Alice Krige|Tyron Leitso|Wentworth Miller|Colin Salmon|Christian Simpson|Hannah Yelland|Anna Maguire|Geraldine Chaplin|Lee Evans|Terry Jones|Greg Bennett|Tasha de Vasconcelos|Moses Rockman|Stuart Wilson|Sang Cam Lui|Junix Inocian|Patrick Monckton|Andy Beckwith|Keith Newby|Marcus White|Zienia Merton|Zizi Strallen|Angelo Andreou|Carl McCrystal|Giles Oldershaw|Adam Blaug|Wil Röttgen|George Antoni|Anne Karam|Emily Keston|Laura-Jane Keston|Anthony Lennon|Mike Savva|Carl Timms
director: Stars: David Thewlis, Katie Carr, Jim Carter | See full cast & crew »
title: Dinotopía: El país de los dinosaurios
